titles.title: Recognizing and commending Baylor University quarterback Robert Griffin III for winning the 2011 Heisman Trophy and for his academic and athletic accomplishments.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary: 12/15/2011--Introduced. Congratulates Robert Griffin III for winning the 2011 Heisman Trophy and for his academic and athletic accomplishments.
